cast.name: 迈克尔·J·索尔 Michael J. Saul
曼努埃尔·卡布拉尔 Manuel Cabral

awards:
第41届柏林国际电影节(1991)
　　主竞赛单元 最佳短片 Dan Bootzin
introduction: At 6 AM in LA, a solitary man gets the newspaper from his front mat and heads for the toilet, to shave, brush and floss his teeth, and sit down for a read. One headline is, "Tenants want quake safety." In the next apartment, the clock radio goes off, blaring Latin music; a young couple and their baby wake. Their talk becomes an argument about the loud music, then some tickling, laughter, and a return to bed. As the man in the bathroom sits, the couple's bedstead bangs rhythmically against the wall, harder and harder: plaster falls, medicines descend from the cabinet into the basin, the toothbrush glass shatters, car alarms go off. Good sex or a 6.9 earthquake?
